EmailTemplate.name: Panga Flotation
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI. The YETI Panga has been intentionally designed as a dry bag to be used for storage and the transport of gear. This is not a flotation device.
Thank you for being a loyal YETI customer, we truly appreciate you.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com Save
